ai_flow.runtime package¶

Submodules¶

ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_context module¶

ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_context.init_job_runtime_context(job_runtime_env: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv)[source]¶

When running the ai flow job, you need to call this function to initialize the project, workflow and job environment information. This function has three functions: 1. Init project configuration 2. Init workflow configuration. 3. Set current job’s name.

ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env module¶

class ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv(working_dir: str, workflow_name: Optional[str] = None, job_execution_info: Optional[ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.JobExecutionInfo] = None)[source]¶

Bases: object

JobRuntimeEnv represents the environment information needed for an ai flow job to run. It contains: 1. project configuration. 2. workflow configuration. 3. Job running depends on resource files. 4. Information when the job is executed.

property dependencies_dir: str¶

return: The directory where the job runs dependent files.

property generated_dir: str¶

return: The directory where the job stores the generated executable files.

property go_dep_dir: str¶

return: The directory where the job runs dependent go files.

property jar_dep_dir: str¶

return: The directory where the job runs dependent jar files.

property job_execution_info: ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.JobExecutionInfo¶

return: Information when the job is executed.

property job_name: str¶

return: The name of the job.

property log_dir: str¶

return: The directory where job logs are stored.

property project_config: ai_flow.project.project_config.ProjectConfig¶

return: The project configuration(ai_flow.project.project_config.ProjectConfig)

property project_config_file: str¶

return: The project configuration file path.

property python_dep_dir: str¶

return: The directory where the job runs dependent python files.

property resource_dir: str¶

return: The directory where job resource files are stored.

save_workflow_name()[source]¶

return: The workflow configuration(ai_flow.workflow.workflow_config.WorkflowConfig)

property workflow_config_file: str¶

return: The workflow configuration file path.

property workflow_entry_file: str¶

return: The path of file that defines the workflow.

property workflow_name: str¶

return: The name of the workflow which the job belongs.

property working_dir: str¶

return: The working directory of the job.

ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_util module¶

ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_util.prepare_job_runtime_env(workflow_snapshot_id, workflow_name, project_context: ai_flow.context.project_context.ProjectContext, job_execution_info: ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.JobExecutionInfo, root_working_dir=None) → ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv[source]¶

Prepare the operating environment for the ai flow job(ai_flow.workflow.job.Job) :param workflow_snapshot_id: It is the unique identifier for each workflow generation. :param workflow_name: The name of the workflow(ai_flow.workflow.workflow.Workflow). :param project_context: The context of the project which the job belongs. :param job_execution_info: The information of the execution of the job. :param root_working_dir: The working directory of the execution of the job(ai_flow.workflow.job.Job). :return: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv object.
